About Sonic Drive-In Sonic Drive-In is a Fast Food restaurant located at 4302 E Chandler Blvd in Phoenix, AZ 85048. Sonic Drive-In has been described as an Good Fast Food restaurant and has received an average rating of 5 by our members. Quick Facts
Cuisine: Fast Food, American (Traditional) Accepts Credit Card: Yes Parking: N/A
Atmosphere: N/A Take Reservations: Yes Serves Alcohol: N/A Smoking Allowed: No

Sonic Drive-In Tips Java chillers
Patricia W. Grape cream slush will change your life!
Charlie J. Try the Ocean Water: Sprite and blue coconut over ice! Get the float with vanilla ice cream if you're brave! Best drink ever!
Zyrion L. Strawberry Limeade in full FX!!!!
djSQEME Try the cranilla craze. It is the best drink at Sonic and underrated
